name: ListLinkedUsers
description:
Retrieve linked or associated users for a given relationship.

Utilize this tool to list either the self link for a primary user or all associated users based on a specified relationship name. If no associations exist, it returns an empty array. Suitable for retrieving user associations in applications using Okta.

parameters.name: user_identifier_or_login
parameters.description: The ID or login of the user to get the primary user ID or associated users. Use 'me' for the current session user.

value_schema.description:
If for the `self` link, this is the ID of the user for whom you want to get the primary user ID. If for the `associated` relation, this is the user ID or login value of the user assigned the associated relationship.

This can be `me` to represent the current session user.

parameters.name: relationship_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the primary or associated relationship to be queried for linked users.

value_schema.description: Name of the `primary` or `associated` relationship being queried
